wikitext.*:
'''Captain of the Hosts''' was a military title of [[Gondor]], perhaps the supreme military position in the Kingdom.<ref>{{HM|Guide}}</ref>

The title is mentioned alongside the name of Prince [[Tarannon]] who, in this capacity, extended the realm along the shores. As [[King of Gondor]], he later took the name "Falastur".<ref>{{App|Gondor}}</ref> It is possible that the position was held by the [[King's Heir]] or another member of the [[House of Anárion]].
